name: radishes
text: Of course he thinks it's good!

name: saint
text: it is good.

name: doublebatman
text: is SO good.

name: mr_pete
text: Man, do not hold it against a fellow. He is trying hard to be polite with a hundred million years of ancestors yelling "RUUUUUDE TITTIES!" at him.

name: jdhenry105
text: THIS IS A HOMEBOY

name: juancarlos
text: Fat titties is where it's at. Sheesh I have achewood tourettes.

name: johnnyrocker
text: I think he's developing a thing for corpulent women.

name: greymantledwolf
text: wonder if that imagination panel implies he's into the idea of life-size motor-boating.

name: omnidope
text: Best thing to say in this situation is "Oh, I was just thinking that she should consider a reduction. It must kill her back!"

name: tekende
text: "That's like slapping God in the face!"

name: mikebox
text: "That's like slapping cattle ranchers who use Bovine Growth Hormone in the face!"

name: tekende
text: "That's like slapping people who haven't seen Superbad in the face!"

name: love_is_so_punk
text:
I just own up to it. "Yeah, so? Did you see them?" Could be one of the many reasons I'm single.

When I had a girlfriend I used to get in trouble when I didn't even look. her: "[i]Did you get a good look?![i]" (that was her favorite phrase). me: "Oh was there a hot chick? Where? Point her out to me! ...well if I'm going to be in trouble for looking anyway, I might as well actually get to look, right?"

And the breast reduction line wouldn't have worked, since she had a ginormous rack herself.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: Molly will fight for her man.

name: greymantledwolf
text: a hallmark of a good dame.

name: petitegitan
text: I'm pretty sure that THOSE are J-cups.

name: soticoto
text:
They're G-cups.
I can just tell.
I've seen K-cups before, apparently natural and frankly rather disturbing. I was wondering how she could even stand up in them at first, but then I realised that the diameter of her legs was mostly muscle and concluded that her spine must have been made primarily of reinforced steel.

name: norsef
text:
Impossible biology that breaks the laws of physics and engineering? Pretty hott!!!

Italics highlight sarcasm.

name: heccibiggs
text:
Oh my God, this thread just reminded of a dream I had last night where I was going around loads of discount bra shops, trying to find all the J-cups they had.

Achewood has invaded my subconscious.

name: lawbot
text: Having a metallic spine is hell of inconvenient. It would not really help you unless your real spinal column has ceased to have functioning bone.

name: atticusonline
text: Unless you could get DSL with it.

name: aelindil
text: My ex-boyfriend had a metal rod attached to his spine because of scoliosis and I can confirm that you do not, in fact, get DSL.

name: atticusonline
text: Your ex boyfriend sounds hot.

name: tellumo
text:
Alt text: (To his credit, the woman's necklace actually was made out of jewelry.)

That gave this strip a boost in my book.

name: rogergs
text: Beef is not an ass man.

name: patkun
text: The tongue! THE TONGUE!

name: mattfish
text:
oh god it looks exactly like this
[IMGS OFF]

name: dropkickpikachu
text: lookidat bunneh

name: mattylite
text: Jesus.  Is that thing's face on the opposite side of its head from where its face should be?

name: mercuri0us
text: No, somebody just spun it's ears upside-down.

name: heccibiggs
text:
I would like to let you know that reading this comment and then looking at the picture again actually caused me to laugh to the point where I put my head on the desk and pounded it (the desk, not my head) with my fist a bit.

It sounds insane but it is like a standard done thing when you are laughing a lot (try it out and you will know what I'm going on about).

name: mattylite
text: I thought it sounded insane, but then I really did try it, and instantly recognized it as something I had done before too. Congratulations on having a person on the internet not think you are insane. And probably a few more congratulations for making someone hit themselves in the head just by writing something on the internet.

name: 1000hz
text:
Beef and I share the same fantasy:

Relaxing enclosed in a giant pair of breasts, with a soda.

name: the_doz
text: primo j/o material

name: roastbeet
text: R. Crumb style.

name: jackparsons
text: Naw, R. Crumb style is non-overweight husky buxom chicks with big ass & thighs. He likes getting rides on their backs.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
Those were real chicks Crumb based his comix on.
At least one was. I know because I knew the one who was the 15 year old all the geezers jumped. And she was a sweet girl. None of that shit happened. All fantasies of R. Crumb's. The little butthead should have given her royalties.
When I knew her she had severe health issues, but was still a hippie years later.

name: deancain29
text: big titted cats. oh god. im the monster?

name: cousinted
text: I like how Beef still has his soda in the last panel, like he's prepared to stay in there for the long haul.

name: desdin0va
text: shouldn't the wendy's logo be reversed from the inside?

name: bovine
text: its a divider / partition such as they sometimes have.

name: hypoluxa
text:
I love that Molly calls her "Bossie".
Fantastic.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Philippe: No More Haikus!
Onstad: I am having a huge problem getting the right kind of toaster oven.

name: rowboat
text: Am I the only person giving this woman chubbies? You think that's easy, what she does? That's a service and it is work! Give it up for her.

name: mysterymeat1001
text: Absolutely. If she can take the time to make the blog posts, then I can take the time to look them up and chubby them--with gratitude!

name: fineoakstructure
text:
I've been giving them chubbies, and, it may sound like I'm bragging, but I was the first one on a lot of them, so don't sass me.

To be honest, I don't think I've actually clicked a single one of the links to the blogs (too easy to get caught up in at work), but damned if I ain't gonna applaud the effort.

name: nyu
text: I think its hot when my woman gets fresh with the ladies.

name: red-barchetta
text: 5 for that last panel. I need air.

name: subrosian
text: I think, had I know it were an option, my childhood's "dream vocation" would have been to live in the cleavage of a large Swedish woman. The furry representation of that is somewhat of a mixed dish, alluring, but only out of a subtle self-disgust

name: fuzzyshoo
text:
Why is it that when I go to wendy's there aren't any attractive, lage busted women in low cut prom dresses?

SHENANIGANS!

name: tekende
text: The Wendy's I go to most often used to have a guy working there who dressed like a girl and wore makeup. His nametag said, I shit you not, "Priness Ashley".

name: slodowy_slicer
text:
Nota Bene: In the penultimate panel, Beef is intensely focused on the boobies. Cf. the first panel of the previous instalment.

(Nota Boobie?)

name: dusty
text: For a moment I thought the pendant above his head was a little balloon on the same scale as tiny beef. Like with his balloon and drink he was having a little party down in there, but more of a small times party than the kind you usually have where breasts are involved.
